channel.title: Config on Ranbo's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Config on Ranbo's Blog

item.title: Use EF In DotNet Core
item.description: How to create entity in dotnet core Install Packages First of all, you need install the packages that needed to create the entitys through the nuget package manager. Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Tools Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Design Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Relational Pomelo.EntityFrameworkCore.MySql Create Entity Then you can create entitys with the following command at the console. For Mysql: Scaffold-DbContext -Provider Pomelo.EntityFrameworkCore.MySql -Context DBContext -Project Common -Connection "Server=192.168.10.100;User Id=ranbo;Password=ranBo000;Database=FILECTLSYS" -outputdir DBModel For Sql: Scaffold-DbContext -Force “Server=192.168.10.100;Database=FILECTLSYS;User ID=ranbo;Password=ranBo000;” Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.SqlServer -OutputDir DBModel

item.title: Flutter Command
item.description: Config Flutter Environment Installation Guide Convert FlutterApp to FlutterWeb #download web sdk flutter channel beta flutter upgrade flutter config --enable-web flutter devices #then type in following words on project terminal #and the web contents will be builded on build/web/ flutter build web Cretae flutter project by commands flutter create --no-overwrite $PROJECT cd $PROJECT flutter analyze flutter test flutter run

item.title: Go CommonTechniques
item.description: Data Conversion 1)int to string s := strconv.Itoa(i) s := strconv.FormatInt(int64(i), 10) 2)int64 to string i := int64(123) s := strconv.FormatInt(i, 10) 3)string to int i, err := strconv.Atoi(s) 4)string to int64 i, err := strconv.ParseInt(s, 10, 64) 5)float to string v := 3.1415926535 s1 := strconv.FormatFloat(v, 'E', -1, 32)//float32s2 := strconv.FormatFloat(v, 'E', -1, 64)//float64 6)string to float s := "3.1415926535" v1, err := strconv.ParseFloat(v, 32) v2, err := strconv.ParseFloat(v, 64) Float format a:=strconv.

item.title: Go Install
item.description: Golang Installation And configuration Windows 1.Download and Installation 2.Set GOPATH in user environment variable settings and global environment variable settings For me: C:\work\Go 3.Verify the installation Command Line: go version 4.Open the GOMOD Command Line: go env -w GO111MODULE=on 5.Create a golang project by vscode and config the setting json { "version": "0.2.0", "configurations": [{ "name": "{yourprojectname}", "type": "go", "request": "launch", "mode": "auto", "program": "${fileDirname}", "env": { "GOPATH": "{your GOPATH}", "GOROOT": "{your GOROOT}" }, "args": [], //"showLog": true } ] } Linux 1.
